name: Babcock Center, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Babcock Center, Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in West Columbia, SC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $75.8M in Medicaid payments across 489K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $75.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
